document_data.name: Beorg
document_data.titles: King of the Tribe of the Wolf
document_data.mainbody: '''Beorg''' was the king of the [[Tribe of the Wolf]].
document_data.History:
Beorg was the strongest [[Reghedman]] warrior and the most powerful king alongside [[Heafstaag]]. He allied with Heafstaag and the traitor [[DeBernezan]] to unite all the tribes in an attack against the [[Ten Towns]] in [[1351 DR]].

However, thanks to the scouting of [[Drizzt Do'Urden]], the men of [[Icewind Dale]] were ready for the battle. Beorg was killed in the fighting. His tribe suffered the most deaths and soon lost much of its influence, becoming a minor tribe.<ref>
